ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: The XML attribute or element is not supported and neglected.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: NotSupportedFeature

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Node cannot be null
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: NodeCannotBeNull

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Models element cannot be null or empty
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: ModelsCannotBeNull

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: NamespaceUris element cannot be null or empty
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: NamespaceUrisCannotBeNull

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Selected model contains errors.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: ModelContainsErrors

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: General processing error see trace for details.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: NonCategorized

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: It is diagnostic information
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: DiagnosticInformation

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: The syntax of the NodeId is not valid.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: NodeIdInvalidSyntax

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: The syntax of the ExpandedNodeId is not valid.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: ExpandedNodeIdInvalidSyntax

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: The syntax of the QualifiedName is not valid.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: QualifiedNameInvalidSyntax

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: The reference target doesn't exist. OPC UA does not require that the TargetNode exists, thus References may point to a Node that does not exist.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: DanglingReferenceTarget

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Nodes shall be unambiguously identified using NodeId
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: NodeIdDuplicated

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: NodeId is not defined.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: NodeIdNotDefined

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: The string part of the DisplayName is restricted to 512 characters.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongDisplayNameLength

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: The value must be less than 0x200000 for the UAVariable and less than 0x400000 for other node types.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongWriteMaskValue

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: The value must be less than 0x7.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongAccessRestriction

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Unexpected value of the InverseName.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongInverseName

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: The BrowseName of a ReferenceType shall be unique.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: DuplicatedReferenceType

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: The BrowseName of a ReferenceType is defined outside of the model.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: BrowseNameReferenceTypeScope

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Wrong Reference type targeting the Property component.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongReference2Property

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Object NodeClass: EventNotifier is out of range.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongEventNotifier

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Object NodeClass: Value of the EventNotifier attribute is not supported.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: EventNotifierValueNotSupported

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: ValueRank value is out of range.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongValueRank

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: AccessLevel value is out of range.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongAccessLevel

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Wrong Reference type targeting the DataVariable component.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongReference2Variable

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Wrong Reference type targeting the Method component.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongReference2Method

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Dangling reference - undefined target of the HasComponent reference.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: UndefinedHasComponentTarget

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Dangling reference - undefined target of the HasProperty reference.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: UndefinedHasPropertyTarget

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Each Node shall be the TargetNode of at most one Reference of type HasSubtype.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: HasSubtypeMulitarget

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Dangling reference - undefined target of the HasSubtype reference.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: UndefinedHasSubtypeTarget

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Undefined HasTypeDefinition - each Variable and each Object shall be the SourceNode of exactly one HasTypeDefinition Reference.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: UndefinedHasTypeDefinition

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Undefined namespace index - The numeric values used to identify namespaces correspond to the index into the NamespaceArray.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: UndefinedNamespaceIndex

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: BrowseName cannot be null string.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: EmptyBrowseName

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: SymbolicName contains characters that are not allowed. Only letters, digits or the underscore (‘_’) are permitted.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongSymbolicName

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Abstract DataType of the field of a concrete structure is not permitted.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: FieldAbstractDataType

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: All fields must be present in derived Structure DataType.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: MissingFieldInDerivedStructure

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Wrong DataType of field derived from Structure.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongDerivedFieldData

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: It is not permitted for two DataTypes to point to the same DataTypeEncoding.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongDataType2DataTypeEncodingReference

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: The DataTypeEncoding Object shall point to exactly one Variable of type DataTypeDescriptionType
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongDataTypeEncoding2DataTypeDescriptionReference

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: The DataTypeDescription Variable shall belong to a DataTypeDictionary Variable.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: WrongDataTypeDescription2DataTypeDictionaryReference

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Only concrete Structured DataTypes may use HasEncoding References. Abstract, Built-in, Enumeration, and Simple DataTypes are not allowed to be the SourceNode of a HasEncoding Reference.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: AbstractDataType2HasEncodingReference

ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Descriptor: Each concrete Structured DataType shall point to at least one DataTypeEncoding Object with the BrowseName “Default Binary” or “Default XML” having the NamespaceIndex 0.
ns1:NamedBuildError.ns1:Name: ConcreteDataType2HasEncodingReference
